attributes.additional_details: To save the Bats that are believed to be roosting there and to protect Alton's heritage.
attributes.background: Stop builders in Alton demolishing Robertson House as it is believed that there are Bats roosting in there. It is also part of Alton's heritage and would most likely be welcome to be changed into a museum.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for East Hampshire District Council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
